languages.text: "Хочешь удовлетворить свои ненормальные потребности — проваливай с корабля и развлекайся. Торговка, хоть она и одной ногой в ереси, не будет тебе кормом".
languages.translation_comment:
Romance with Jae broken during the Jealousy dialogue.
Marazhai: "Mmm, what an interesting bouquet. This is because of the Rogue Trader, isn't it? I cannot discern which it is... strangled ambition or simple jealousy? Would you like me to help unburden you?"

languages.text: "If you are looking to satisfy your perverse needs — then get lost and do it elsewhere. The peddler may have one foot planted in heresy, but she will not serve as your food."
languages.translation_comment:
Romance with Jae broken during the Jealousy dialogue.
Marazhai: "Mmm, what an interesting bouquet. This is because of the Rogue Trader, isn't it? I cannot discern which it is... strangled ambition or simple jealousy? Would you like me to help unburden you?"
languages.original_text: "Хочешь удовлетворить свои ненормальные потребности — проваливай с корабля и развлекайся. Торговка, хоть она и одной ногой в ереси, не будет тебе кормом".

traits.locale_text: "If you are looking to satisfy your perverted needs — then get lost and do it somewhere else. The peddler may have one foot in heresy, but she will not serve as your food."

languages.text: 「歪んだ欲望を満たしたいのなら、さっさと失せて他所でやれ。行商人は異端の片足を突っ込んでいるかもしれないが、お前の食い物にはならん」
languages.original_text: "If you are looking to satisfy your perverse needs — then get lost and do it elsewhere. The peddler may have one foot planted in heresy, but she will not serve as your food."

traits.locale_text: 「歪んだ欲望を満たしたいのなら、さっさと失せて他所でやれ。行商人は異端の片足を突っ込んでいるかもしれないが、お前の食い物にはならん」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr Eure perversen Bedürfnisse befriedigen wollt – dann verschwindet und macht das woanders. Die Händlerin mag mit einem Fuß in der Ketzerei stehen, aber sie wird Euch nicht als Nahrung dienen."
languages.original_text: "If you are looking to satisfy your perverse needs — then get lost and do it elsewhere. The peddler may have one foot planted in heresy, but she will not serve as your food."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr Eure perversen Bedürfnisse befriedigen wollt – dann verschwindet und macht das woanders. Die Händlerin mag mit einem Fuß in der Ketzerei stehen, aber sie wird Euch nicht als Nahrung dienen."

languages.text: «Si buscas satisfacer necesidades perversas, piérdete y hazlo en otra parte. La buhonera tendrá un pie en la herejía, pero no te servirá de alimento».
languages.original_text: "If you are looking to satisfy your perverse needs — then get lost and do it elsewhere. The peddler may have one foot planted in heresy, but she will not serve as your food."

traits.locale_text: «Si buscas satisfacer necesidades perversas, piérdete y hazlo en otra parte. La buhonera tendrá un pie en la herejía, pero no te servirá de alimento».

languages.text: “如果你打算满足你的变态欲望，那我劝你赶紧滚远点。这个小贩可能确实一只脚跨过了异端的红线，但她绝不会成为你的食粮。”
languages.original_text: "If you are looking to satisfy your perverse needs — then get lost and do it elsewhere. The peddler may have one foot planted in heresy, but she will not serve as your food."

traits.locale_text: “如果你打算满足你的变态欲望，那我劝你赶紧滚远点。这个小贩可能确实一只脚跨过了异端的红线，但她绝不会成为你的食粮。”

languages.text: "Sapkın arzularını tatmin etmenin peşindeysen kaybol, işini başka yerde gör. O tüccar her ne kadar kâfirliğin sınırlarında dolaşsa da senin yemeğin olmayacak."
languages.original_text: "If you are looking to satisfy your perverse needs — then get lost and do it elsewhere. The peddler may have one foot planted in heresy, but she will not serve as your food."

traits.locale_text: "Sapkın arzularını tatmin etmenin peşindeysen kaybol, işini başka yerde gör. O tüccar her ne kadar kâfirliğin sınırlarında dolaşsa da senin yemeğin olmayacak."

languages.original_text: "If you are looking to satisfy your perverse needs — then get lost and do it elsewhere. The peddler may have one foot planted in heresy, but she will not serve as your food."

languages.text: « Si vous cherchez à assouvir vos besoins pervers, vous pouvez aller vous faire pendre ailleurs. La bonimenteuse a peut-être un pied dans l'hérésie, mais elle ne vous servira pas de nourriture. »
languages.original_text: "If you are looking to satisfy your perverse needs — then get lost and do it elsewhere. The peddler may have one foot planted in heresy, but she will not serve as your food."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous cherchez à assouvir vos besoins pervers, vous pouvez aller vous faire pendre ailleurs. La bonimenteuse a peut-être un pied dans l'hérésie, mais elle ne vous servira pas de nourriture. »
